messageValues.message:
You are an assistant that extracts structured tasks from meeting summaries.

Return a JSON array. Each task should have:
- task
- owner
- category
- deadline (YYYY-MM-DD)
- status (default: "not completed")
- file (if mentioned, else null)

parameters.subject: New Tasks Added to Project Sheet
parameters.message:
=Hello,

New tasks have been added to the project tracker.

You can view the sheet here:
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1BiklMrA05BcpOaUY0ur4czHWT0PAR6iQxpBBIKzaipI/edit?gid=1779524410#gid=1779524410

Regards,  
Your AI Project Assistant

headers.subject: Subject: Meeting Summary

json.html:
Meeting Purpose
Align on content strategy for real estate webinars, press releases, and marketing efforts.

Key Takeaways
Team preparing ERP features presentation for real estate, tailored to business types (leasing, sales, rentals)
Webinars planned for vetted potential clients; concerns raised about content protection
PR/articles to focus on industry trends, not specific webinars; real estate client collaborations can be highlighted
Monthly content planning cycle established: journalist trends by 21st, team alignment by month-end
Topics
ERP Features Presentation
Team developing presentation on ERP features for real estate management
Covers multiple business types: leasing, sales/purchase, rentals, niche markets
Separate from webinar content; focuses on offered features and solutions
Webinar Strategy
Aimed at actual clients/customers interested in the solution
Content protection concerns raised; need for attendee vetting process
Challenge: balancing openness (e.g., LinkedIn webinar) with protecting proprietary info
Internal demo planned for late July; live session targeted for early August
Press Release and Article Approach
Avoid mentioning specific webinars in press releases
Focus on industry-specific content, avoiding direct company promotion
Highlight features and achievements in real estate industry
Collaborate with real estate clients for press releases when applicable
Include impactful numbers and data to attract media attention
Content Alignment Process
Rupa's team to provide journalist story trends by 21st-22nd of each month
Pradeep's team to adjust content calendar based on these trends
Salman to share topic information and webinar session plans
Team to shape webinar and podcast content to match overall strategy
Timeline and Action Items
Rupa: Share journalist trends by 21st-22nd monthly
Pradeep: Prepare August plan for social media, blogs, and webinars
Team: Internal webinar demo in late July
Team: Live webinar session planned for early August
Aadil: Schedule recurring meeting for last Friday of each month
Next Steps
Salman to share topic details and webinar plans with the team
Rupa to provide journalist trends by July 21st-22nd
Pradeep to develop content calendar for August, including social media, blogs, and webinars
Team to conduct internal webinar demo in late July
Aadil to send calendar invite for recurring monthly alignment meeting (last Friday)
Plan first live webinar session for early August,
